meanings.definition: Attend an event or meeting with someone else.
meanings.sent1: I will be coattending the conference with my colleague.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys coattending workshops to learn new skills.
meanings.sent3: Coattending the seminar with my friend made it more fun.
meanings.sent4: We were like two peas in a pod, coattending the training session.
meanings.sent5: The experience of coattending the lecture was enlightening.

meanings.definition: Participate in a joint activity or task with another person.
meanings.sent1: They are coattending the project to ensure its success.
meanings.sent2: Coattending the group project helped us collaborate effectively.
meanings.sent3: Coattending the cooking class with my sister was a blast.
meanings.sent4: Together, we coattending the challenge, overcoming obstacles.
